components.title: Maracas

description: A set of maracas with a colorful motif painted on them.
title: Maracas

version.description:
Unicode 15.0 is the version of the Unicode Standard released on September 13, 2022. 20 new emoji code points were added in this release, with all 31 new emojis (including sequences) listed under Emoji 15.0.

 

  • üìù Unicode 15.0 details on Unicode.org

apple_vendor_description: The maracas emoji on Apple devices are depicted as two vibrant, wooden instruments adorned with colorful beads and tassels, ready to shake out a rhythm. Apple's glossy 3D shading gives them a tactile quality, as if you can almost feel the smooth wood and the slight movement of the beads. Their lively appearance and association with music and festivity make them ideal for expressing joy, excitement, or a desire to dance and celebrate in digital communication.
